description: Try our easy to follow Lime Cheesecakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cheesecake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Baking,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Lime Cheesecakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g soft cream cheese, at room temperature
2 limes, finely grated zest and juice, plus extra zest to decorate

recipeInstructions.text: Line the base of each ramekin with a biscuit. Put the cream cheese in a mixing bowl and whisk with an electric hand whisk until smooth, then whisk in the condensed milk until well combined.

Add the lime zest and juice, whisk until the mixture becomes smooth, thick, and glossy, and divide among the ramekins. Smooth the tops. Chill for at least 4 hours, or overnight. Decorate with extra lime zest (if using), and serve.
